      • resize

        public void resize​(int width,
                   int height)
        Description copied from interface: Layer

        Resize layer framebuffer/area for rendering.

        Must be called for proper rendering if window content area is resized.

        Specified by:
        resize in interface Layer
        Overrides:
        resize in class LayerGL
        Parameters:
        width - new framebuffer width in pixels
        height - new framebuffer height in pixels
